Uranium / Arsenic Mitigation

FREE Estimates, Fast Service, We know selling your house can be frustrating!

Everyone in Connecticut should be testing for Uranium and Arsenic. YOU should know what you are drinking! Uranium and Arsenic are linked to diseases, illnesses and cancers (EPA Website: Uranium)

We can help you with testing and mitigation. Contact us today and we can walk you through the steps. We can come out and test your water for you, once we have the results, we can discuss your best options, if necessary.

Uranium and Arsenic are mitigated using different methods. We find the most effective way, for uranium, is with Anion Exchange. Which is the opposite of a normal softener, which is with Cation Exchange. This methods is less hazardous and VERY efficient. Arsenic can be mitigated with the use of specially formulated media, depending on the amount. Call today to find out more.
